segments.text: Hi , I'm home ! Can you double that recipe ? I ran into an old friend after work and invited him for dinner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . Who is it ? Anyone I know ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't think so . Do you remember Bob Gain from Tulsa ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That name doesn't ring a bell . But tell me more .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He was on the diving team with me in high school and saved my life one day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'll have to personally thank him by making him my famous chocolate cake .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're glad he saved me , huh ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Absolutely ! Bob and his whole family are welcome here any time !
segments.speaker: S2
